extendedInfo.description: Shopping at DealExtreme is designed for mobile users, which is officially approved by DealExtreme.com. With the software, you will be able to follow DX whenever and wherever you are. DealExtreme is an e-commerce platform with a wide selection of gadgets, consumer electronics, flashlights, toys, iPhone & iPad & iPod accessories, cell phones, digital cameras and camcorders, life style gadgets, DIY parts and game accessories.We dedicate to bring you a sensible shopping experience at unbeatable price and worldwide free shipping.Features:1.New Arrivals.2.Promotion Campaigns.3.Top Sellers.4.Online Payment(Paypal).5.Shopping Cart.6.Product Details: Show you SKU overview / specifications / images / reviews.7.Gadgets of the Week: Check every weekly hot deals.8.Products Searching.9.Product Categories Browsing10.Account Log in/out and Sign up.11.Wish List Management.12.Orders Tracking. online shopping,buy,dealextreme,dx,dx mobile,free shipping,store,cool gadgets, tablet pc,computer,toy, diy,cool gadgets,flashlight,electronic,Car Accessories

reviews.title: Okay program.
reviews.comment: But it needs a landscape view. Other than that it\'s nice for deal extreme shopping. Needs bug fixes though.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hideous
reviews.comment: This appears to use jQuery Mobile and masquerades as a nasty iOS application with the footer menu.  Navigation IRS confusing, loading is perpetual and it\'s much less useful than the mobile site.  Keep at it, Epro...
reviews.author: Alastair Gilfillan

reviews.title: Very long shipping times
reviews.comment: It took a while to get my shipment delivered, but I am very pleased with merchandise, especially my htc one x case.
reviews.author: Vladimir Vujosevic

reviews.comment: I have ordered products from them.shipment time is ok but customs can take time to clear.not impressed with search results.enter an item and who knows what will pop up
reviews.author: joe street

reviews.title: Syncronize problem with main account
reviews.comment: Android, Motorola XT910. No syncchronize with main account. For example I have 20 wish items in \"Shopping Cart\" but in mobile version I see zero. Need be fixed next versrion.
reviews.author: Michael Friedland

reviews.title: What happened?
reviews.comment: This app used to be my preferred way to browse DX.  The wish list and and to cart functions almost never work now. Hitting back wants to exit you from the app all together instead of bringing you back to the list. Also for some reason when placing orders using this app the order was added into to old DX order system and did not get fulfilled for 2-3 weeks until I contacted customer service. Things went from good to awful really quick with this app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Buggy
reviews.comment: Really needs bug fixes, related items, less clumsy cart, and syncing cart with website... Better use website for now until bugs fixed.
reviews.author: rene tegel

reviews.title: Has potential, annoying on site failures
reviews.comment: If DX fails you lose whatever context/search/pagination you where at, which makes it pretty unusable (!).
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awful
reviews.comment: Cannot even login, dont know why but im 100% sure that my account info was correct. Also hitting the back button goes totally wrong. Also removing your password doesnt work, it goes back to the previous page. All in all: Very buggy.  I do love the app tho, just because i love to browse around on the road but this means that i still have to hop onto my PC to have a stable and smooth dealextreme experience.
reviews.author: Daniel Breedeveld

reviews.comment: Big fan of dealextreme, big fan of this app! Works well so far on my EVO3D. Love this!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Where is my account?
reviews.comment: The previous app allowed me to browse my shopping history. Why did it disappear in this version?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: huge problem
reviews.comment: everytime I tried to edit the quantity of the item its going me to mad its go to back to main screen
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Freeze my phone
reviews.comment: After many scroll down my phone freeze
reviews.author: Bruno Tafarelo

reviews.title: Eh
reviews.comment: Seems to work nicely, would be 4-5 stars if it had landscape mode
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very good app but...
reviews.comment: New version is really good, almost everything is in, but it is made for smaller screens, on tablets its work OK, but interface is stretched.
reviews.author: Igor Vujacic

reviews.title: Sync
reviews.comment: Does not sync my shopping cart between online and this app. What\'s the point of signing in if this doesn\'t work?
reviews.author: James Sorenson

reviews.title: This is horrible
reviews.comment: It\'s slow, looks horrible and doesn\'t have any features like sort or price range. I\'d rather use my phone browser.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A bit rubbish
reviews.comment: The Dealextreme mobile website is better - this app doesn\'t let you search within search results, making it very hit or miss whether or not you\'re going to find what you\'re looking for
reviews.author: Neil Austin

reviews.title: Clunky app with no point
reviews.comment: If you\'re going to buy from deal extreme just use their website
reviews.author: Peter Waine
